name: Alpino thar GT
mainDescription: Take a ride into music with bass so supersonic it cannot be contained even by our cushioned earcups.

descriptions.description3: Noise isolation for that zen energy

descriptionText.text1: With dual powerful 40mm sound stage drivers, experience bass that makes the world move.
descriptionText.text2: Sweat-proof cushion earcups that make undisturbed music more relaxing than ever.
descriptionText.text3: Passive noise cancelling headphones make for truly living in the moment with other sounds blocked up.
descriptionText.text4: Bluetooth headphones come with built-in microphone for hands-free calling.
descriptionText.text5: Snug fit, foldable and adjustable headphones with comfort over 200 mah make sure you experience the comfort of luxury.

battery.batteryLife: Battery life: 6 hours per full charge

features.feature1: Bluetooth 3.1 compatible with Mobile Devices, Laptops, Tabs, PCs, Other devices connecting to bluetooth

name: Alpino Flex Pro
mainDescription: Nano-coating and a powerful battery makes this neckband a sweat-proof powerhouse that keeps connecting with Bluetooth and magnetic earbuds.

descriptionText.text1: Nothing can stop this device from having a powerful 260mAh battery with unmatched 23 hours playback and upto 500 hours of standby time in a full charge.
descriptionText.text2: In-line Button Voice Control, Change the tracks, Play/ Pause Button with Battery indicator display (on select model smartphones) give you the opportunity to literally push boundaries. We also give you an in-built microphone to make your voice travel the world.
descriptionText.text3: Ergonomic sport design coupled with our invisible nano coating makes sure your workouts make you sweat, not your earphones.
descriptionText.text4: Bluetooth 5.0 allows you to use this device even at a distance of 10metres and our A2DP technology allows you to pair with and connect to 2 devices simultaneously.
descriptionText.text5: Metallic magnetic earbuds make for the perfect safety when not using our flexible and foldable neckband.

battery.batteryLife: Battery life: 25 hours per full charge

features.feature1: Bluetooth 5.0 compatible with Mobile Devices, Laptops, Tabs, PCs, Other devices connecting to bluetooth

name: Alpino Power Flex
mainDescription: The only thing more powerful than the magnetic earbuds, is the device itself. Give in to a neckband that sings and hears.

descriptionText.text1: Ergonomic sport design coupled with our invisible nano coating makes sure your earphones, unlike your workouts remain sweat-free.
descriptionText.text2: In-built microphone along with in-line Button Voice Control, Change the tracks, Play/ Pause Button with Battery indicator display (on select model smartphones) give you the opportunity to literally push the buttons of your choice.
descriptionText.text3: Bluetooth 5.0 allows you to use this device even at a distance of 10metres and our A2DP technology allows you to pair with and connect to 2 devices simultaneously.
descriptionText.text4: A powerful 250mAh battery with unmatched 23 hours playback and upto 500 hours of standby time in a full charge, makes for undisturbed usage.
descriptionText.text5: Metallic magnetic earbuds make for the perfect safety when not using our lightweight flexible and foldable neckband.

battery.batteryLife: Battery life: 22 hours per full charge

descriptionText.text1: Ergonomic sport design coupled with our invisible nano coating makes sure your earphones, unlike your workouts remain sweat-free.
descriptionText.text2: In-built microphone along with in-line Button Voice Control, Change the tracks, Play/ Pause Button with Battery indicator display (on select model smartphones) give you the opportunity to literally push the buttons of your choice.
descriptionText.text3: Rechargeable 135mAh battery that gives 18 hours of playback along with 180hours of standby so your music can be enjoyed unplugged.
descriptionText.text4: Bluetooth 5.0 allows you to use this device even at a distance of 10metres and our A2DP technology allows you to pair with and connect to 2 devices simultaneously.

name: Alpino Thar fit
mainDescription: Oblique ear fittings in a lightweight acoustic delight with bass powerful enough to drive you into fitness.

descriptionText.text1: A powerful 10mm speaker to give you HD bass that makes your music take flight.
descriptionText.text2: Light earphones that are champions in style and make you forget the world.
descriptionText.text3: Oblique angled ear fittings to give you the comfort of a mother’s touch.
descriptionText.text4: 8 hours of talk-time for uninterrupted music on the go.
descriptionText.text5: In-built microphone with voice assistant so your voice reaches above and beyond.
descriptionText.text6: IPX4 certified sweat-proof earphone so summer days or workout evenings don’t interrupt your music.
descriptionText.text7: The fitness earphones are equipped with sensitivity of about 96±3db which make it’s convenience to the best and with the earphones.

name: Alpino Town Square Mini
mainDescription: Use this speaker to make music the mega center of your life with the power of connectivity and controls at the touch of a finger.

descriptionText.text1: Supreme 500mAh rechargeable battery that makes for undisturbed music upto 4 hours.
descriptionText.text2: Bluetooth 4.1 with a 10m range gives you the flexibility to move in the entire town.
descriptionText.text3: Volume rockers, power, mode, forward, backward, pause, play controls along with aux-in, USB and micro SD card slots give this device autonomous power.

name: Alpino Thar Drift
mainDescription: Never put your feet off the gas, with beats that are stronger, power that lasts longer and connectivity that takes you farther.

descriptionText.text1: 1200 mAh rechargeable battery means your music can live upto your energy levels for 6 hours straight and you can enjoy 160 hours of standby time.
descriptionText.text2: Bluetooth 5.0 with a 10m range of connectivity means your music never leaves your side.
descriptionText.text3: USB, FM radio, SD card, Aux-in port, microphone, holding strap, are just some of the features that you can drive with on the Thar Drift.
descriptionText.text4: Our wireless speaker gives you the adventures of a lifetime with the mobility you deserve.

name: Alpino Rock
mainDescription: Go back in time with a look inspired by the good ol’ age of music, but take a leap into the future with features that are centuries ahead.

descriptions.description6: Plenty of rocks to throw on

descriptionText.text1: Antenna gives this modern device a classic feel, for those that love to go retro!
descriptionText.text2: A powerful bass radiator transforms Alpino Rock into a boulder when the music starts playing.
descriptionText.text3: Bluetooth 5.0 with a 10m range makes this device deliver sound so strong that there is no scope for competition.
descriptionText.text4: With a 1200mAh rechargeable battery, this speaker can go on playing for 8 hours with a standby time of 100hours.
descriptionText.text5: This speaker packs a unique smartphone stand along with USB input, FM Radio, SD card input, Aux In & Microphone in support and holding strap that give it top of the line features.
descriptionText.text6: With the availability of red, black, yellow, grey and blue colour variants, and a refreshing mesh-design you have the options that match your unique style.
